data.message: I assume your comment is just joking. Well, in jQuery and Angular.JS, AJAX calls return a promise object, which gets resolved when the call finishes.

Note that promise API although has a standard in progress, is not always the same when implemented by different libraries. This video I recorded at SydJS usergroup in June shows what a promise is and how different libraries implement it:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_sY9R68mhqI
